description: Umubyeyi wese igihe atwite agomba kwitabwaho no kwisuzumisha nibura inshuro imwe mu gihembwe mu rwego rwo gukurikirana ubuzima bwe n’ubw’umwana.
title: Umubyeyi wese igihe atwite agomba kwitabwaho no kwisuzumisha nibura inshuro imwe mu gihembwe mu rwego rwo gukurikirana ubuzima bwe n’ubw’umwana.
content: Umubyeyi wese igihe atwite agomba kwitabwaho no kwisuzumisha nibura inshuro imwe mu gihembwe mu rwego rwo gukurikirana ubuzima bwe n’ubw’umwana. Ni byiza kandi ko we n’umuryango we bashobora kuba bamenya ibimenyetso bidasanzwe cyangwa iby’ibise. Bagomba kandi guteg-anya uburyo bwabafasha kubyarira ku ivuriro rite ibikoresho bibafasha kubyara neza n’igihe cyose havuka ikibazo.
